mapper.select: SELECT ID, PASSWORD, NAME, EMAIL, ADDRESS, KIND, ACCOUNT, ACCOUNT_NAME, BANK, PROFILE_IMG, ALARM_CONSENT, BUSINESS_NUMBER, BUSINESS_NAME, REGDATE FROM PS_MEMBER WHERE ID = #{sessionId}
mapper.update: update PS_MEMBER set password = #{password}, email = #{email}, address = #{address}, account = #{account}, account_name = #{account_name}, bank = #{bank}, profile_img = #{profile_img}, alarm_consent = #{alarm_consent}, business_number = #{business_number}, business_name = #{business_name} where id = #{id}

update PS_MEMBER set password = #{password}, email = #{email}, address = #{address}, account = #{account}, account_name = #{account_name}, bank = #{bank}, profile_img = #{profile_img}, alarm_consent = #{alarm_consent}, where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from ps_product where deal_status = '0' and seller_id = #{sessionId}
select * from ps_product where deal_status = '1' and seller_id = #{sessionId}
select * from ps_product where deal_status = '2' and seller_id = #{sessionId}

select a.seller_id, a.subject, a.first_img, a.price, a.category_num, b.purchase_num, b.product_num, b.buyer_id, b.regdate, b.status, c.status as ps_order_status from(select seller_id, subject, first_img, price, category_num, product_num from ps_product)a, ps_purchase_list b , ps_order c where a.product_num = b.product_num and b.purchase_num = c.purchase_num and b.buyer_id = #{sessionId} order by b.regdate desc

select a.ORDER_NUM, a.BUYER_ID, a.STATUS, a.TOTAL_PRICE , a.DESTINATION, a.ACCOUNT, a.ACCOUNT_NAME, a.BANK, a.PURCHASE_NUM, a.DELIVERY_COMPANY, a.INVOICE_NUM, b.seller_id, b.subject, b.first_img, b.category_num, b.product_num from(select * from PS_ORDER )a, ps_product b where a.product_num = b.product_num
